title: Video: NO – There’s A Glow
content:
I’m a sucker for Grand Theft Auto 5, and I love LA outfit NO, so combining the two is only going to be great, right? Yeah, of course it is.

For their new video for There’s A Glow, NO go all Californication on us, drawing scenes of chaos from the hit game whilst following lead singer Bradley Hanan Carter around the streets of Los Santos (based on Los Angeles). There’s explosions, punch-ups and a startlingly lack of involvement from the police, before culminating in a typical video game twist, somehow fitting perfectly with the epic, fists to the sky anthemic feel of the track itself.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
